pullRequest.title: Change of behavior in module m:d:o365EmailAddresses:mu
pullRequest.bodyText:
it will check duplicities with g:d:o365EmailAddressess:o365mu instead
of gr:d:o365EmailAddresses:mu
logic was changed accordingly, one of them were removed becuase there
is no need to test uniqueness in unique attribute
tests were changed accordingly

commit.message:
Change of behavior in module m:d:o365EmailAddresses:mu

 - it will check duplicities with g:d:o365EmailAddressess:o365mu instead
 of gr:d:o365EmailAddresses:mu
 - logic was changed accordingly, one of them were removed becuase there
 is no need to test uniqueness in unique attribute
 - tests were changed accordingly
